name: IOHIDEventService
desc: The base class for implementing a device or operating system service that dispatches events to the system.

items.name: - dispatchKeyboardEvent
items.desc: Dispatches a keyboard-related event to the system.

items.name: - dispatchRelativePointerEvent
items.desc: Dispatches a relative pointer event to the system.

items.name: - dispatchAbsolutePointerEvent
items.desc: Dispatches an absolute pointer event to the system.

items.name: - dispatchDigitizerStylusEvent
items.desc: Dispatches a digitizer stylus event to the system.

items.name: - dispatchDigitizerTouchEvent
items.desc: Dispatches a digitizer touch event to the system.

items.name: - dispatchRelativeScrollWheelEvent
items.desc: Dispatches a relative scroll wheel event to the system.

items.name: - dispatchEvent
items.desc: Dispatches a HID event to the system.

items.name: - SetLED
items.desc: Configures the on/off state for an LED on the device.
